TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 321
TEI.2.document_title: James Whiteside to Stephen F Austin, 01-15-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Whiteside to Austin, January 15, 1830. Receipt for $50, paying board of certain Mexicans.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 321

div1.p: James Whiteside to Austin, January 15, 1830. Receipt for $50, paying board of certain Mexicans.

body.div1:
San Felipe de Austin 1st Decr 1829
Padillas Secretary Rumayor to J. Whiteside Dr
To board Patterson 53 days While sick------------——-----~------$53.00
To board of 2 Mexicans Servants 12 days------------~-------------- 15.00
To use of Room 1 Month--------------------------- 10.00
28 To board from 1st. instant to this day---- 14.00
21st Decr 1829---------------92.00
Received of Col Austen $50.00 James Whiteside
15th Jany 1830 Received of Rumayor Eleven dollars-----
61
$31.00 due
